dir-section.heading: The Environment
dir-section.p: The opening of the Temelín nuclear power station in 2000 caused controversy, and caused relations with neighbouring Austria to become strained. Protected areas include the country’s first national reserve, the Český Ráj (’Bohemian Paradise’), the natural limestone environment of Český Kras and the Šumava National Park.

org-entry.content-note: affiliated to the Ministry of the Environment
conservation of fauna, flora, soils and landscape of the National Park

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Nature and Landscape Protection Agency of the Czech Republic
org-entry-head.alt-name: Agentura Ochrany Přírody a Krajiny ČR

org-entry.content-note: f. 2015 to succeed Czech Institute for Nature Conservation

member of the European Topic Centre on Biological Diversity consortium, the European Centre for Nature Conservation, International Union for Conservation of Nature, Europarc Federation and Carpathian Network of Protected Areas
state supervision of nuclear safety, co-ordination of international relations in the sphere of nuclear safety
research in meteorology, climatology, aeronomy, upper atmosphere, space physics, wind energy, ionospheric and magnetospheric physics

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Institute of Chemical Process Fundamentals of the CAS

org-entry.content-note: fundamental research in chemical, biochemical, catalytic, photochemical, microwave and environmental engineering

internationally supported projects include chemical engineering, thermodynamics, catalysis for the production of environmentally friendly diesel fuels, fuel reactivity and release of pollutants, and studies of atmospheric and laser chemistry, and helicene synthesis

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Institute of Experimental Botany of the CAS

org-entry.content-note: plant physiology, genetics, phytopathology and biotechnology
workshops and courses on nature conservation, excursions to National Parks, owns land with field station and nature trails
emphasis on eco-design, waste prevention and eco-innovation

campaigns on protected areas, national parks, nature reserves, endangered animal and plant species, wildlife habitats, resource protection, forest management, pollution, waste disposal, protected monuments, and enforcement and promotion of environmental law
mem. of the World Conservation Union
defends civil rights and legal protection of the environment

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Friends of the Earth Czech Republic
